On Vancouver Island

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re:  2285 -  unschool philosophy
messages.msgSnippet: ... I would have written more at the time had I felt it was interesting and useful enough to add to the conversation. And I d certainly add more if Tanya asked
messages.messageBody:
on 8/27/02 2:40 AM, Luz Shosie and Ned Vare at nedvare@... wrote:
>> What has proven to you that unschooling would work and/or is would be
>> practical for you?

> Joyce, you wrote a lot in response to this, but now can you try to answer
> the question. I'm serious.

I would have written more at the time had I felt it was interesting and
useful enough to add to the conversation. And I'd certainly add more if
Tanya asked me or another unschooler who's sincerely interested in learning
more about unschooling. I find those kind of people and questions inspiring.

You and your reasons for asking don't inspire me, Ned. And I'd much rather
spend my time talking to people who have questions on their journey to
unschooling.

Joyce
